quizDescription.text:
Instruction :
  1. This section is not an openbook.
  2. On the screen recording software when you start this section
  3. Write all the options in lower case, in case multiple options write as comma separated (x,y,z)

questionText.text:
Which of the following models can be used to predict sentiment during text analysis?
a. Logistic regression
b. Random Forest
c. CART
d. All of the above

What type of filtering would you use if MSIT was to start suggesting courses based on grades obtained in subjects (new courses have similar content as the old ones)?
a. Collaborative
b. Hybrid
c. Content-based
d. None of the above
How many clusters would you split a dataset into, given its Dendrogram as follows

a. 1, because all points fall in the cluster
b. 2, because there is a large distance between these two clusters
c. 10, because each data point is a cluster
d. None of the above

True or False : Classification trees, regression trees can capture nonlinearities.
a. True
b. False

True or False : Complex parameter for trees to be high for good performance of trees.
a. True
b. False
